books_2021.Title: Twelve (The Naturals, #4.5)
books_2021.Author: Barnes, Jennifer Lynn
books_2021.Description: A novella in The Naturals series following teenage profilers as they solve cold cases with their unique psychological skills.

books_2021.Title: Riot Baby
books_2021.Author: Onyebuchi, Tochi
books_2021.Description: A powerful story of siblings navigating systemic racism, where one develops supernatural abilities as a response to oppression.

books_2021.Title: The Cruel Prince (The Folk of the Air, #1)
books_2021.Author: Black, Holly
books_2021.Description: A human girl raised in the treacherous High Court of Faerie must navigate deadly politics and her attraction to the wicked Prince Cardan.

books_2021.Title: Lore
books_2021.Author: Bracken, Alexandra
books_2021.Description: Every seven years, nine Greek gods are forced to walk the earth as mortals in this modern hunt-inspired thriller.

books_2021.Title: Outlawed
books_2021.Author: North, Anna
books_2021.Description: In an alternate Old West where barren women are hanged as witches, a fugitive midwife joins a gang of outcast women.

books_2021.Title: The Wicked King (The Folk of the Air, #2)
books_2021.Author: Black, Holly
books_2021.Description: Jude must maintain control over King Cardan while navigating faerie politics and her growing complicated feelings for him.

books_2021.Title: We Are Okay
books_2021.Author: LaCour, Nina
books_2021.Description: A poignant story of grief and isolation as a college freshman confronts the traumatic loss that made her flee her old life.

books_2021.Title: Yolk
books_2021.Author: Choi, Mary H.K.
books_2021.Description: Two estranged Korean-American sisters reconnect when one is diagnosed with cancer, exploring identity and family bonds.

books_2021.Title: Anna K: A Love Story (Anna K, #1)
books_2021.Author: Lee, Jenny
books_2021.Description: A modern Anna Karenina retelling set among Manhattan's elite teenagers, complete with scandalous affairs and social media drama.

books_2021.Title: Saga, Volume 3
books_2021.Author: Vaughan, Brian K.
books_2021.Description: The epic space opera continues as new parents Alana and Marko face escalating dangers while protecting their magical child.

books_2021.Title: Ye
books_2021.Author: Petreca, Guilherme
books_2021.Description: A collection of modern poetry exploring love, identity, and the immigrant experience with raw vulnerability.

books_2021.Title: The Prison Healer (The Prison Healer, #1)
books_2021.Author: Noni, Lynette
books_2021.Description: A healer in a brutal prison must keep a mysterious patient alive through four deadly trials in this high-stakes fantasy.

books_2021.Title: The Wrath and the Dawn (The Wrath and the Dawn, #1)
books_2021.Author: Ahdieh, Renee
books_2021.Description: A retelling of Arabian Nights where a girl volunteers to marry a murderous boy-king to avenge her best friend.

books_2021.Title: The Gilded Ones
books_2021.Author: Forna, Namina
books_2021.Description: A girl with golden blood joins an elite army of near-immortal warriors to fight against a patriarchal empire.

books_2021.Title: The Brideship Wife
books_2021.Author: Howard, Leslie
books_2021.Description: A Victorian woman travels to British Columbia as a potential bride for gold rush miners, seeking independence.

books_2021.Title: Laura Dean Keeps Breaking Up with Me
books_2021.Author: Tamaki, Mariko
books_2021.Description: A queer teen navigates a toxic relationship while learning about self-worth through advice column letters.

books_2021.Title: The Rose & the Dagger (The Wrath and the Dawn, #2)
books_2021.Author: Ahdieh, Renee
books_2021.Description: Shahrzad fights to break Khalid's curse while political tensions threaten their kingdom in this Arabian-inspired sequel.

books_2021.Title: Anna K: Away (Anna K, #2)
books_2021.Author: Lee, Jenny
books_2021.Description: The sequel finds Anna in Seoul recovering from scandal while her friends navigate new relationships back in NYC.

books_2021.Title: Siege and Storm (The Garden, #2)
books_2021.Author: Bardugo, Leigh
books_2021.Description: Alina Starkov returns to Ravka to face the Darkling while grappling with her growing Sun Summoner powers.

books_2021.Title: Shadow and Bone (The Shadow and Bone Trilogy, #1)
books_2021.Author: Bardugo, Leigh
books_2021.Description: An orphan discovers she's a rare Sun Summoner who might save her war-torn country from the Shadow Fold.

books_2021.Title: The Hidden Palace (The Golem and the Jinni, #2)
books_2021.Author: Wecker, Helene
books_2021.Description: The long-awaited sequel reunites Chava and Ahmad as new supernatural threats emerge in 1900s New York.

books_2021.Title: Ruin and Rising (The Shadow and Bone Trilogy, #3)
books_2021.Author: Bardugo, Leigh
books_2021.Description: Alina makes her final stand against the Darkling in the conclusion to the Grisha trilogy.

books_2021.Title: Saga, Volume 2
books_2021.Author: Vaughan, Brian K.
books_2021.Description: The fugitive family's cosmic journey continues with more bizarre planets, deadly assassins, and parental struggles.

books_2021.Title: Ace of Spades
books_2021.Author: Abíké-lyímidé, Faridah
books_2021.Description: Two Black students at an elite academy fight back when an anonymous bully exposes their secrets in this Gossip Girl meets Get Out thriller.

books_2021.Title: Watch Over Me
books_2021.Author: LaCour, Nina
books_2021.Description: A foster teen takes a job on a haunted farm where the past literally replays itself in this atmospheric ghost story.

books_2021.Title: Piranesi
books_2021.Author: Clarke, Susanna
books_2021.Description: A man explores an endless labyrinthine house in this mysterious, philosophical novel about memory and identity.

books_2021.Title: Loki: Where Mischief Lies
books_2021.Author: Lee, Mackenzi
books_2021.Description: The God of Mischief teams up with Victorian detectives to solve supernatural murders in this YA Marvel adventure.

books_2021.Title: Early Departures
books_2021.Author: reynolds, Justin a.
books_2021.Description: Two former best friends get a second chance when one is temporarily resurrected after dying in a freak accident.

books_2021.Title: Crooked Kingdom (Six of Crows, #2)
books_2021.Author: Bardugo, Leigh
books_2021.Description: Kaz Brekker's crew fights for revenge and redemption in the thrilling conclusion to the Six of Crows duology.

books_2021.Title: Six of Crows (Six of Crows, #1)
books_2021.Author: Bardugo, Leigh
books_2021.Description: A criminal prodigy assembles a crew for an impossible heist in this gritty fantasy set in the Grishaverse.

books_2021.Title: The Downstairs Girl
books_2021.Author: Lee, Stacey
books_2021.Description: A Chinese-American girl secretly writes an advice column while working for a wealthy family in 1890s Atlanta.

books_2021.Title: Displacement
books_2021.Author: Hughes, Kiku
books_2021.Description: A teen is transported back in time to witness her grandmother's experience in Japanese internment camps.

books_2021.Title: Court of Lions (Mirage, #2)
books_2021.Author: Daud, Somaiya
books_2021.Description: The conclusion to the Mirage duology finds Amani navigating dangerous court politics as a body double for the princess.

books_2021.Title: The Library of Fates
books_2021.Author: Khorana, Aditi
books_2021.Description: A princess and oracle's apprentice embark on a quest to undo a cruel emperor's conquest through magical fates.

books_2021.Title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
books_2021.Author: Schwab, Victoria
books_2021.Description: A woman cursed to be forgotten by everyone she meets finally finds someone who remembers her after 300 years.

books_2021.Title: Saga, Volume 1
books_2021.Author: Vaughan, Brian K.
books_2021.Description: Two soldiers from warring planets fall in love and have a child in this groundbreaking space opera comic.

books_2021.Title: Within These Wicked Walls
books_2021.Author: Blackwood, Lauren
books_2021.Description: An Ethiopian debtera (exorcist) takes a job cleansing a haunted mansion with a cursed young heir in this Jane Eyre-inspired fantasy.

books_2021.Title: Killer Instinct (The Naturals, #2)
books_2021.Author: Barnes, Jennifer Lynn
books_2021.Description: Teen profilers investigate a serial killer copying the crimes of their mentor's infamous serial killer father.

books_2021.Title: Deadly Little Scandals (Debutantes, #2)
books_2021.Author: Barnes, Jennifer Lynn
books_2021.Description: Southern debutantes uncover dangerous family secrets in this sequel full of twists and high society intrigue.

books_2021.Title: The Queen of Nothing (The Folk of the Air, #3)
books_2021.Author: Black, Holly
books_2021.Description: Jude returns to Faerie to face Cardan one last time in the explosive conclusion to the Folk of the Air trilogy.
